sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterModule, ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { ReactiveFormsModule, FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Observable, combineLatest } from 'rxjs'; import { map, startWith } from 'rxjs/operators'; import { NewsService } from '../../../core/services/news.service'; import { News, NewsFilter } from '../../../core/models/news.model'; import { LoadingComponent } from '../../../shared/components/loading/loading.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-news-list', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule, ReactiveFormsModule, LoadingComponent], template: `

{{ showArchived ? 'Archived' : 'All' }} News

No news found

{{ showArchived ? 'No archived news available.' : 'No news articles match your criteria.' }}

{{ news.title }} Archived

{{ news.summary }}

{{ news.author }} {{ news.publishDate | date:'mediumDate' }}
{{ tag }}
` }) export class NewsListComponent implements OnInit { // ... class implementation ... }
